017
018package com.github.tommyettinger.kryo.jdkgdxds;
019
020import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo;
021import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Input;
022import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Output;
023import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.serializers.MapSerializer;
024import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.CharFilter;
025import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.FilteredStringOrderedMap;
026import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.Utilities;
027
028import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
029
030public class FilteredStringOrderedMapSerializer extends MapSerializer<FilteredStringOrderedMap<?>> {
031    public FilteredStringOrderedMapSerializer() {
032        super();
033        setKeysCanBeNull(false);
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    protected void writeHeader(Kryo kryo, Output output, FilteredStringOrderedMap<?> map) {
038        CharFilter fil = map.getFilter();
039        if(fil == null)
040            throw new NoSuchElementException("A FilteredStringOrderedMap must have a non-null filter to be serialized.");
041        output.writeString(fil.getName());
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    protected FilteredStringOrderedMap<?> create(Kryo kryo, Input input, Class<? extends FilteredStringOrderedMap<?>> type, int size) {
046        return new FilteredStringOrderedMap<>(CharFilter.get(input.readString()), size, Utilities.getDefaultLoadFactor());
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    protected FilteredStringOrderedMap<?> createCopy(Kryo kryo, FilteredStringOrderedMap<?> original) {
051        return new FilteredStringOrderedMap<>(original.getFilter(), original.size(), original.getLoadFactor());
052    }
053}
